DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effect `` Tailored Physical Activity '' number sick-days . The hypothesis `` Tailored Physical Activity '' superior efficacy sick-days .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy `` Tailored Physical Activity '' Health Care Workers
DOC.detailed_description: Health care worker high prevalence musculoskeletal pain . Pain back neck musculoskeletal disorder lead cause long-term sick leave . This study test effect `` Tailored Physical Activity '' self-reported day sick leave parameter regard pain , function quality life respectively body function participation level health care worker experience musculoskeletal pain relate back upper body . A minimum 44 health care worker DK-Sønderborg Municipality randomize `` Tailored Physical Activity '' reference group . Primary endpoint 3 month 12 month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Health care worker municipality Sønderborg experience musculoskeletal pain related spine upper body . Medically safety .
